items.title: Employment Commission Makes Direct Appeal To White Males Facing Workplace Discrimination
items.description: The Trump administration's Equal Employment Opportunity Commission is launching an assault on DEI discrimination against white men.

items.title: Killing Of Nigerian Christians Underscores Islam Is Incompatible With Safety And Freedom
items.description: Nigeria is the epicenter of the fight for jihadist control and the imposition of sharia law over all of Africa.

items.title: Vivek Ramaswamy Is Wrong About American Identity And Wrong About America
items.description: A disembodied notion of American identity means that America is really nothing at all, and no one is really an American.
